name: ArboviralDiseaseTestsForArbovirusFlavivirusByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Arboviral Disease (Tests for Arbovirus/Flavivirus by Culture and Identification Method)
description: This value set includes codes for generic tests for unspecified Arbovirus and Flavivirus.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of unspecified arbovirus or flavivirus),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: arbovirus or flavivirus),(Exclusion Criteria: Condition-specific tests)

Arbovirus identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
Flavivirus identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture

contains.display: Arbovirus identified in Blood by Organism specific culture
Arbovirus identified in Specimen by Organism specific culture
Flavivirus identified in Specimen by Organism specific culture
